website_summaries.verdict: The Asus VivoBook S15 makes a good coffee shop laptop for those who want a bigger screen. Just make sure to pick a table near an outlet.
pros: The Asus VivoBook S15 puts a big 15.6-inch screen in an ultraportable body starting at a reasonable price
It has a spacious backlit keyboard, a responsive precision touchpad with a built-in fingerprint reader and nice-sounding stereo speakers
It's available with discrete graphics and dual storage drives
cons: Battery life is brief compared with its competitors

customer_reviews.title: Good value driver
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is a good value for what it provides. But, the screen and sound though fair are a little underwhelming. My older ASUS NV53V has much brighter screen and it sounds a lot better than this one. Everything else is top notch. ----Update 7/19/2017 I have used this laptop for a month now. To be fair, the display and sound are both as one would expect other laptops in the price bracket. In the era of rating inflation, I will up my rating to full 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: S. Choudhary

customer_reviews.title: Love this ASUS
customer_reviews.text: Replacing an 8 year old 17" Acer I ordered two different Acers only to return them both. This ASUS is GREAT. I love the configuration. Its Elegant, fast as hell and excellent choice for home computing. I use a MacBook Air at work and it has nothing on my new ASUS. Thanks to Amazon Prime and their return policy I've got the the perfect laptop for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Kohl

customer_reviews.title: ... I wasn't sure how it would be but I love it. It's worked well for the past 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous to buy this laptop because I wasn't sure how it would be but I love it. It's worked well for the past 2 months I've had it. It is very quick, especially when it boots up. The screen has an amazing display and there are no real issues with the product. The only downfall is that there is no CD/DVD player, and the keys aren't really backlit, but other than that it functions as it should!
customer_reviews.author: Kaileigh Becker

customer_reviews.title: Mouse Pad and HDMI Port Don't Work
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer for the most part, speakers aren't that loud and the fan can be loud, but my mouse pad won't work properly sometimes and my HDMI port doesn't work. Sound through the headphone jack is low too. I found out about the HDMI port not working while I tried hooking up my computer for a class presentation. I'll probably have to send my computer in to get fixed and once the mouse pad and HDMI port gets fixed then I'll update this review to 5 stars. This is a great computer for the most part, I think I just got a lemon. I'm not rough with my computer at all and I've never dropped it either.
customer_reviews.author: Suri

customer_reviews.title: Charger Doesn’t Last
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Asus and at first I liked a lot about it. It’s lightweight, has good sound/video quality and overall performs well for the price. However, the battery life isn’t great and it usually only lasts 2-3 hours between charges. And as others have pointed out, the chargers tend to overheat and burn out the internal components. I’ve had this computer for less than a year and am already on my third charger. I hate to recommend someone not buy a laptop just because of an issue with the charger, but replacements are expensive, hard to find, and it’s just annoying to constantly be replacing them.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing....Though I suspect this is Microsoft's fault
customer_reviews.text: Each Microsoft update disabled the touchpad. I had thought I didn't need a touch-screen option, though perhaps this would've saved the purchase...ASUS support was TERRIBLE. Amazon support was GREAT. However, the 'fix' was a hard re-set. So, the computer performed only until the next update. MADDENING. . I returned the VIVOBOOK and Amazon was fabulous - credited my account very quickly. Ironically, I ended up buying a Microsoft Surface laptop.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: the parts have good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has a feel of very high quality. Also, the parts have good quality for the price. My wife uses it for studying, and leaves everything open. The memory in the laptop has been able to handle everything open, and the ssd drive makes the boot time quick. Another great feature is the battery life. It has a really long lasting battery. This is a good laptop for someone looking for a higher end model laptop for work.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Office/Work
customer_reviews.text: I dont use this for gaming and i been using this for almost over a month now. This was bought so i can do work in the library and in school. The keyboard was great. It basically makes no noise when typing. Non of that awkward typing noise ever again in the library. Graphics and monitor resolution is also commendable.
customer_reviews.author: C Cheng

customer_reviews.title: 16 Months Old and It Just Died
customer_reviews.text: I will NEVER again buy an ASUS - it's totally dead and needs to be replaced. I purchased it on 2/5/18. A motherboard costs nearly as much as a new laptop, so I'm walking away from this thing. And, by the way, I had it diagnosed by 2 separate repair shops.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C. Arkuszewski

customer_reviews.title: Speedy and very sleek
customer_reviews.text: As an experienced Windows 10 user, this laptop was absolutely beyond my expectations after I purchased it. I've had it for almost 3 months and the performance is amazing. It's very fast even on slower internet speeds, and weighs very little with a very sleek design. I can store almost anything with the storage capabilities. I rated this laptop 5 stars because I couldn't imagine anything better. The only thing I would change if I could is the quality of the webcam. It's low pixel and not the best for video chatting. The speakers are okay with adequate bass. I've only had Dell laptops before but I will definitely be purchasing Asus again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Fulford

customer_reviews.title: Giant piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This computer is a piece of junk. The WiFi has a serious issue since day 1 of purchasing it. I contacted asus and they told me to contact amazon. I contact amazon and they tell me to contact asus.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Won’t recommend it
customer_reviews.text: In less than a year, the fan has to be replaced, the hinge between screen and base broke, and battery is dead. I wouldn’t recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Samer K. Zawaideh

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard failed within a month and a half.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard failed within a month and a half. I tried communicating with Asus but they did not help. Amazon let me return it late but I only got a refund for 80%.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Restrepo

customer_reviews.title: Fast, efficient and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer, be it a laptop or a vivo book. No matter what you call it it works. I love the metal body and the finish on it. It has all the things I wanted including ,i7, I have used Asus help/chat line several times and they have been great about walking me through any problem I was having.
customer_reviews.author: Elliefan

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laptop for a few days now and I love it! It is very fast. The only thing that I wish it had (and I knew this before purchasing) is a numeric keypad, so I have to use the number buttons on the top. The fingerprint scanner is also a very nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Trash laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst product i have ever own!! Not even the FN key works and the screen colors are horrible. Is slow for almost anything and it continuously gives errors. I will never ever again buy another Asus computer!!! Completely disatisfied!! Update: Just this month the computer completely died! It lasted JUST ONE YEAR!! I WANT MY MONEY BACK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard damaged and bad support
customer_reviews.text: My laptop got damaged and I take it to the center support in my country three months ago and until now I don't have my laptop repaired, they say that there are problems importing the new keyboard. I recommend not to buy this vendor, ASUS does not have real support, I recommend for everybody to buy a trustful vendor like HP or Toshiba.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: Two Warranty Repairs In First Year
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. ASUS quality has declined. Within the first year the screen began blanking and other issues popped up. Had to send it back to warranty (including paying shipping costs) twice in the first year. Its a bad laptop and I will not buy ASUS again.
customer_reviews.author: Iowan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU PLAN TO USE A HEADSET WITH MICROPHONE - IT IS NOT SUPPORTED PER ASUS TECH SUPPORT!
customer_reviews.text: This computer DOES NOT WORK WITH ANY HEADSET/MIC. Per Tech Support, if it uses a headphone, it cannot also use a mic. RIDICULOUS! DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU WILL EVER WANT TO USE A HEADSET/MIC!
customer_reviews.author: JulieB

customer_reviews.title: Overall, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for around 2 1/2 years now. Works great for a college student, lots of storage and is super light to carry in a purse or backpack. Can play some PC games like Sims 4 or Minecraft. However, the fingerprint reader only works 60% of the time and the laptop refuses to work if it has an update lingering in the background.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: This has been my best buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for girlfriend. I sent a couple laptops back because they just weren't exactly what I think she would like. So I spent a little extra and omg out is totally worth it! Tested out myself beforehand and reset it so she can customize it herself when she gets it on Christmas. Will update how she feels about it from time to time if I remember
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Bryant

customer_reviews.title: SUPER LOUD FAN
customer_reviews.text: hmmm the overall performance is great and all the features backlighting and the screen. The thing i hate most or at all is the super loud fan!! that’s the only negative i have. And sometimes the fingerprint thing doesn’t read so u have to press multiple times or sign in a different way but that’s no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: kahmya

customer_reviews.title: ... has solid state drive which makes it start up super fast. I also like that the keyboard design ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and has solid state drive which makes it start up super fast. I also like that the keyboard design helps keep it clean, My previous laptop accumulated all sorts of stuff between the keys. However it is a bit too sensitive for me and any small touch is interpreted as a movement. Also the battery life does not 6 hours as stated.
customer_reviews.author: LittleBit6

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: This was purchase for my wife. She loves it. She is very impressed with the performance. The slim, light weight package is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Nolle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so lightweight! I’ve had it for about two months. Don’t love the mouse/trackpad at all, but that’s easily solved by using a plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Shyra Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Died after 17 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the first year and 5 months and then out of nowhere just died and there was nothing they could do to help and the one year warranty had passed. A computer should last longer than that. Because of the lack of free tech support/diagnosis I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Polebaum

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I was hesitant on buying an Asus ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I was hesitant on buying an Asus just because I've always been a Mac girl, but I'm very pleased with this so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for the Features
customer_reviews.text: Great Screen Size and not too Heavy, Thinner than most. Amazon Prime Delivery Delayed
customer_reviews.author: Peter L. Chin

customer_reviews.title: Fast startup!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned about 4-5 different laptops over the years and this one is the best I’ve owned. The best part is how quickly the computer starts up, that was an important feature for me. No issues after 8 months!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Typing responsiveness is fast, log in time fast, ...
customer_reviews.text: Typing responsiveness is fast, log in time fast, overall performance fast. This company has taken laptop use to a whole new level. I use it for school and have no problem paring it via Bluetooth to any other device necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Scott

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best computer I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Turns on quickly. Strong wireless connection. Very portable and light weight. Fast processing. Probably the best computer I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Crosbie

customer_reviews.title: Disk constantly at 100%... Is there even an SSD on this thing?
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I start this thing up it seems like a laptop from 2005... This thing goes on 100% disk usage and stays there for a LONG time. I see no evidence that this OS is on an SSD, because holy moly this thing is SLOW.
customer_reviews.author: Danielthompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It's been 1.5 years and working great. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: drbug

customer_reviews.title: and he is very pleased with the performance with this machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, a first year college student, and he is very pleased with the performance with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: William Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the money. Feels like a plastic toy. For 8gb ram and i7 processor it performs horribly. Quick start up time though.
customer_reviews.author: tyler michaud

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this computer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this computer! I bought it to replace an older ASUS which served me faithfully for eight years. Was time to replace it with another ASUS.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Received in good quality and with backlit keyboard. However the excel inside need to be re-installed for the account keeps showing unlicensed. The 15.6 inch screen looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound/speakers for such a good laptop
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong: this laptop is light years ahead of any computer I have ever owned. It is slim, light, fast, great looking... I really wanted one that had an SSD and hard drive so I could work quickly but store a lot of photographs and at work. But for streaming video it is terrible – the sound is very quiet and very muffled. I don’t want to have to get external speakers or wear headphones every time I want to watch a show. Haven’t decided if I’m going to return it but I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hansell

customer_reviews.title: Good overall but fan is too loud
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the fan is way too loud. It's crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Shinjae Yoo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase - well worth the $$.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop. Better than advertised. Customer support is "real people", not an answering machine.
customer_reviews.author: ray gardner

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard light doesn't turn on unless you get a atk driver from asus.
customer_reviews.text: Prefect as a on-the-go laptop. Had a problem with the keyboard light, but found the driver for it in the asus webpage.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was the best choice! I am so happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this computer! Great purchase for the money. It's quick and reliable. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Errors and support not responding
customer_reviews.text: my laptop is shutting down 2-3 times in week showing errors always different i tried contact product support twice and nobody answered to me and when i contacted ASUS support service they told me what i need to do and on the end they told me that it has internal issue but seller or even product support is not reacting on my emails ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing computer. Does everything I want it to. Speakers are crap and so is webcam
customer_reviews.author: SobearMermaid

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality,light weight.Easy to carry around anywhere.Sleek design.Not the best audio quality,but is good for people who use it for office work.People using it for media purposes,its not the best option.
customer_reviews.author: nidhi pawar

customer_reviews.title: Internet connection stinks!
customer_reviews.text: It's just ok. Battery is not that great and I am having extremely irritating issues with wi-fi. It continuously loses internet connection. The internet issue started about a month ago, a few months after I purchased this. It has trouble just finding a wi-fi to connect to and when it does it loses it. I have restarted in and shut it down, waited a while, and started back up and still internet issues. When you pay over $800 for a laptop you would expect it to work perfectly for at least a year especially since I don't do much on it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: CPU problem, fan overruns most of the time (even ...
customer_reviews.text: CPU problem, fan overruns most of the time (even when simple websites in use) over %100, freezing and not responding to mouse pad. Returned for an another unit...
customer_reviews.author: Mehmet K

customer_reviews.title: Great but dent on lid.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great device however I received it with a dent on the lid. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Guerero

customer_reviews.title: The screen is nice and big
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son when he started college this fall. He LOVES it. I got it 2 days after I ordered it. The screen is nice and big, it is extremely light weight, and it is just looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Gill

customer_reviews.title: Laptop functionalities were not working properly
customer_reviews.text: Laptop touchpad is not working properly. Disappointing ...it is not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.  Light, lit keyboard pad, and ASUS reputation. Even bought my son one.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Only thing I don’t like it that it has no numerical keyboard . You have to use upper keyboard numbers. But otherwise awesome! I have always had good result with ASUS. A+
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D. Lyden

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Computer is broken. ASUS won't fix it or replace it.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappinted.
customer_reviews.text: Graphics are not good. Battery life? 8hrs? Lol non- existent, more like 8 minutes. Cannot even connect to Wi-Fi properly. My old hp amda8 series... with a broken screen lol is working better. I've only had the laptop a few hours and I completely regret the purchase. The only good thing is the exterior looks bomb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a number keypad on the right hand side.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: ASUS VivoBook S 15.6” Full HD Laptop, Intel i7-7500U 2.7GHz, 8GB RAM, 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD, Windows 10, Fingerprint Sensor, Backlit Keyboard.
product_meta.description: Style:Intel i7 | 128G SSD/1TB HDD (2017 Version)ASUS Vivo Book S510UA-DB71 15.6" Full HD Laptop; 7th Gen Intel Core i7-7500U Processor 2.7GHz (4M Cache, Turbo up to 3.5GHz); 8GB DDR4 RAM; 128GB M.2 SSD + 1TB 5400RPM HDD; Windows 10; Fingerprint Reader; HD Webcam; Thin and Portable; Backlit keyboard; 1920 x 1080 Ultra-slim screen; Dual Band 802.11ac Wi-Fi; Bluetooth 4.1; 1x HDMI 1.4; 1x USB 3.1 Type-C (Gen 1); 1x Headphone-out & Audio-in Combo jack; 42WHr Li-ion Battery.
feature_bullets: Powerful & efficient 7th Generation Intel Core i7-7500U 2.7GHz (Turbo up to 3.5GHz) processor with improved media engine for smooth and uninterrupted playback
15.6" Full HD Wide view color rich display with up to 178° viewing angle. Slim 14.2" wide, 0.7" thin and portable footprint with 0.3" bezel for a stunning 80% screen-to-body ratio
Comprehensive connections including USB 3.1 Type-C (Gen1), USB 3.0, USB 2.0, and HDMI; Lightning-fast dual band 802.11ac Wi-Fi keeps you connected through any congestion or interference
8GB DDR4 Ram, 128GB M.2 SSD + 1TB HDD combo, and ergonomic backlit keyboard with convenient fingerprint sensor
Durable & long-lasting lithium polymer battery charges up to 60% capacity in just 49 minutes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars162 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
